pages.md:
# The EVF/LCD Displays

The status of the connection to computers, Frame.io, FTP servers, and the like is also shown by an icon in the electronic viewfinder or LCD monitor.

!EVF/LCD Display Icons

| Icon | Connection Status |
|------|-------------------|
| !Icon 1 | No network connection. |
| !Icon 2 | Connected to network but not to computer tethered photography software, Frame.io, or FTP server. |
| !Icon 3 | Ready for tethered photography, FTP upload, or upload to Frame.io. |
